message:
Yep, I got it. It looks pretty good!

But now I need to fill in my name/website/email once again, that becomes a bit tedious. It would be good if you could keep that info somewhere, and already fill it up.

I need comments starting from this weekend, so I'll use one of the other (already established) solutions, but I can check on your service again if I ever have the need.

Thanks
